tswitem.name: Signet of Perpetual Motion
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Perpetual Motion
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: While you are moving, you gain a beneficial effect which increases your damage by 4%/8%/12%. Standing still removes this effect. If this effect is removed it cannot be regained for 4 seconds. This Signet can be attached to Head Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power. "
